description: Monitor for newly constructed services/daemons through Windows event logs for event IDs 4697 and 7045. (Citation: Secure Ideas SMB Relay) Deploy an LLMNR/NBT-NS spoofing detection tool.(Citation: GitHub Conveigh)

external_references.description: Kuehn, E. (2018, April 11). Ever Run a Relay? Why SMB Relays Should Be On Your Mind. Retrieved February 7, 2019.
Robertson, K. (2016, August 28). Conveigh. Retrieved November 17, 2017.
